description:
I installed nova trunk version. I run through install steps, euca-register-image etc steps, then doing a 'euca-describe-images' I get

UnknownError: An unknown error has occurred. Please try your request again.

Looking in nova-api-log, I see a python error:

... I took out some of the log entries as they have keys & ip addresses & stuff...can provide if needed...but you can see the python error here...

2011-06-27 08:09:27,573 AUDIT nova.api [4HQ28EFSYGUSWEM6RGJN bioadmin ACE_test_cloud] Authenticated Request For bioadmin:ACE_test_cloud)
2011-06-27 08:09:27,573 DEBUG nova.api [-] action: DescribeImages from (pid=27182) __call__ /usr/lib/pymodules/python2.6/nova/api/ec2/__init__.py:214
2011-06-27 08:09:27,574 DEBUG nova.api [-] arg: Owner.1		val: self from (pid=27182) __call__ /usr/lib/pymodules/python2.6/nova/api/ec2/__init__.py:216
2011-06-27 08:09:27,574 ERROR nova.api [4HQ28EFSYGUSWEM6RGJN bioadmin ACE_test_cloud] Unexpected error raised: get_images_detailed() got an unexpected keyword argument 'filters'
(nova.api): TRACE: Traceback (most recent call last):
(nova.api): TRACE:   File "/usr/lib/pymodules/python2.6/nova/api/ec2/__init__.py", line 320, in __call__
(nova.api): TRACE:     result = api_request.invoke(context)
(nova.api): TRACE:   File "/usr/lib/pymodules/python2.6/nova/api/ec2/apirequest.py", line 78, in invoke
(nova.api): TRACE:     result = method(context, **args)
(nova.api): TRACE:   File "/usr/lib/pymodules/python2.6/nova/api/ec2/cloud.py", line 1097, in describe_images
(nova.api): TRACE:     images = self.image_service.detail(context)
(nova.api): TRACE:   File "/usr/lib/pymodules/python2.6/nova/image/s3.py", line 75, in detail
(nova.api): TRACE:     return self.service.detail(context)
(nova.api): TRACE:   File "/usr/lib/pymodules/python2.6/nova/image/glance.py", line 106, in detail
(nova.api): TRACE:     limit=limit)
(nova.api): TRACE: TypeError: get_images_detailed() got an unexpected keyword argument 'filters'
(nova.api): TRACE: 
2011-06-27 08:09:27,575 ERROR nova.api [4HQ28EFSYGUSWEM6RGJN bioadmin ACE_test_cloud] Environment: 

The nova-api version I have is:

ii  nova-api                      2011.3~d2~20110625.1215-0ubun OpenStack Compute - API frontend
title: euca-describe-images results in nova-api 'TypeError' in get_images_detailed()

comments.content:
I installed nova trunk version. I run through install steps, euca-register-image etc steps, then doing a 'euca-describe-images' I get

UnknownError: An unknown error has occurred. Please try your request again.

Looking in nova-api-log, I see a python error:

... I took out some of the log entries as they have keys & ip addresses & stuff...can provide if needed...but you can see the python error here...

comments.author: https://api.launchpad.net/1.0/~mike-nw

comments.content: You probably need to upgrade glance. What version do you have?
comments.author: https://api.launchpad.net/1.0/~bcwaldon

comments.content:
Ok, glance was at the release version, i updated it, now its the same as the rest.

The error is now ECONNREFUSED, It looks like client error; http 400 (bad request)

comments.author: https://api.launchpad.net/1.0/~mike-nw

comments.content: Looks like Nova can't connect to Glance (like bad IP/port)... Could you check your setup and make sure the Glance location location is correctly specified for Nova ? In doubt, give more details on your configuration and post your configuration files.
comments.author: https://api.launchpad.net/1.0/~ttx

comments.content: Yeah, make sure you use the new glance_api_servers flag in place of glance_host and glance_port
comments.author: https://api.launchpad.net/1.0/~bcwaldon

comments.content: Marking as Invalid, please reopen if you can't solve this with proper configuration.
comments.author: https://api.launchpad.net/1.0/~ttx
